Sentencas: A novel integrated multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant with a net electrical power output of 5.97 x 10(5) kW is developed and investigated by energy and exergy analyses.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The electrical power plant including coal gasification, natural gas solid oxide fuel cell, cryogenic air separation unit, carbon dioxide transcritical and steam cycles, and liquefied natural gas regasification sub-systems.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The potential of operating performance improvement by conducted energy and exergy analyses is assessed.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: Also, the thermal design and heat integration analyses are performed for studying the system sustainability and emphasizing on no requirement for external hot and cold utilities.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: Effects of the main design parameters such as fuel cell operating parameters, ambient temperature and liquefied natural gas thermodynamic specifications on the system operating performance are examined.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: The obtained results indicate that the overall energy and exergy efficiencies reach to a maximum value of about 56.4% and 57.9%, respectively; in the case of fuel utilization of solid oxide fuel cell is about 80.0%.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: Furthermore, increasing the ambient temperature and current density decrease the system operating performance.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses

Sentencas: In contrast, the system performance increases with the liquefied natural gas vapor pressure.
Titulo: Evaluation of an optimal integrated design multi-fuel multi-product electrical power plant by energy and exergy analyses
